headline: Skyworks Solutions (SWKS): Strong Balance Sheet and Steady Dividend Growth
summary: Skyworks Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:SWKS) is included among the 10 Cash-Rich Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now. Skyworks Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:SWKS) is a global semiconductor leader with innovative analog and mixed-signal semiconductors that enable wireless connectivity in smartphones, automotive, and industrial automation solutions. Its technologies open up applications such as 5G networks, edge Internet of Things […]
